definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Science and technology is the number one productive force (from 1978 speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平 introducing the Four Modernizations 四個現代化|四个现代化).
pinyin: ke1 xue2 ji4 shu4 shi4 di4 yi1 sheng1 chan3 li4
containing_words.word: 科学技术是第一生产力

sentences.english: The theoretical breakthrough of plutonomy originated basically from the breakthrough of productivity.
sentences.chinese: 政治经济学的理论发展根源于生产力的突破。

sentences.english: Forest Eco-economic Productivity and the Development of Forestry Produce;
sentences.chinese: 生产力的发展是社会变革的根本动力。

sentences.english: Both the liberation and the expansion of the productive forces are essential.
sentences.chinese: 应该把解放生产力和发展生产力两个讲全了。

sentences.english: Both the liberation and the expansion of the productive forces are essential.
sentences.chinese: 应该把解放生产力和发展生产力两个讲全了。

sentences.english: The stand of big density has a larger quantity of living beings and net productivity .
sentences.chinese: 密度大的林分，生物量和净生产力也大。

sentences.english: This equates to more productivity and a better fiscal bottom line.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，公司就会更具生产力，具有更高的财政底线。

sentences.english: It has to consume more and become more innovative and productive.
sentences.chinese: 中国必须增加消费，必须更具创新力和生产力。
你必须监管你的生产力。

sentences.english: The first has to do with productivity.
sentences.chinese: 首先，这一变化与生产力有关。

sentences.english: The warming and drying of the climate in the plateau resulted in the decending of climate-productivity.
sentences.chinese: 黄土高原气候暖干化使作物气候生产力下降。

sentences.english: China is the most populous nation with vulnerable environment and under-developed productivity.
sentences.chinese: 是中国人口众多，底子薄，生产力不发达。

sentences.english: Remove the tripwires that are limiting productivity and threatening your team.
sentences.chinese: 扫清那些阻碍生产力和威胁你团队的不利因素。

sentences.english: You will end up taking things out on your coachee and that is counter productive and unfair.
sentences.chinese: 这样对你的学员来说是不公平的，而且会损害生产力。

sentences.english: Meeting exceeding the as-bid productivity profit margin of the projects.
sentences.chinese: 达到或超过项目预期的生产力和利润。

sentences.english: But we do know about productivity.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们对生产力却很了解。

sentences.english: Labor in direct service to consumers is "unproductive."
sentences.chinese: 直接为消费者服务的工作和劳动是“无生产力”的。
